name: SomeGoodNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Every Sunday your host John Krasinski highlights some good news from around the world. Say “Alexa, Play Some Good News” to get the latest. Got some good news you want to share? Tag us @somegoodnews or use the hashtag #SomeGoodNews.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
